Goblins are some of the creatures that can be found in the Vault of War inside the Stronghold of Security, which is the first level of the stronghold. The fact this area in the stronghold is named after war makes this a very fitting location for goblins to be found, considering they are avid followers of Bandos, the god of war.

'''Goblins''' are some of the creatures that can be found in the [[Vault of War]] inside the [[Stronghold of Security]], which is the first level of the stronghold. The fact this area in the stronghold is named after war makes this a very fitting location for goblins to be found, considering they are avid followers of [[Bandos]], the god of war.
